hints.content: Let's use the place value blocks to help us solve.

Let's put our tens and ones together.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/b343ac97177b1c3ac70d37128a0616ab6a726e47)

 We have $8\text{ tens}$ and $4\text{ ones}$.

In all, there are $8\text{ tens}$ and $4\text{ ones}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/d2647a8325ee83a35cadab04bb73ccb711eab109)

$8\text{ tens} + 4\text{ ones}= 84$
